trans-unit.source: Please choose the type of content element.
trans-unit.target: Tscherni il tip da cuntegn da l'element.

trans-unit.source: Here you can add a headline to the content element.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti agiuntar in titel a quest element da cuntegn

trans-unit.source: You can use HTML tags to format the text.
trans-unit.target: Vus pudais utilisar tags da HTML per formatar il text.

trans-unit.source: Add an image to the content element.
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar in maletg a l'element da cuntegn.

trans-unit.source: Please select a file or folder from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna ina datoteca u in ordinatur en la survista da datotecas

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter an alternate text for the image (alt attribute).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti inditgar in text alternativ per il maletg (vegn en l'attribut alt).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the image title (title attribute).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti inditgar in titel per il maletg (vegn en l'attribut title).

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the image dimensions and the resize mode.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus definir las dimensiuns dal maletg ed il modus per far pli pitschen il maletg.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left margin.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti inditgar la distanza sura, dretg, sut e sanester dal maletg

trans-unit.source: A custom image link target will override the lightbox link, so the image cannot be viewed fullsize anymore.
trans-unit.target: Ina atgna adressa da colliaziun surscriva la colliaziun a lightbox, uschia ch'il maletg na vegn betg pli mussà en la vista cumpletta.

trans-unit.source: Open the full-size image in a lightbox or the link in a new browser window.
trans-unit.target: Avrir la vista cumpletta en ina lightbox respectivamain avrir ina nova fanestra dal navigatur.

trans-unit.source: Please specify how to align the image.
Here you can enter a short text that will be displayed below the image.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti inditgar in curt text che vegn mussa sut il maletg.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the list of allowed HTML tags in the back end settings.
trans-unit.target: Vus pudais editar la glista dals tags da HTML ch'èn lubids en las preferenzas en il back-end.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the type of list.
trans-unit.target: Tscherni il tip da la glista.

trans-unit.source: If JavaScript is disabled, make sure to save your changes before modifying the order.
trans-unit.target: Sche JavaScript è deactivà stuais vus memorisar las midadas avant che editar la successiun dals elements.

trans-unit.source: If JavaScript is disabled, make sure to save your changes before modifying the order.
trans-unit.target: Sche JavaScript è deactivà stuais vus memorisar las midadas avant che editar la successiun dals elements.

trans-unit.source: Please enter a short summary of the table and describe its purpose or structure.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha ina curta resumaziun da la tabella e descriva l'intent u la structura.

trans-unit.source: Make the first row of the table the table header.
trans-unit.target: Utilisar l'emprima lingia da la tabella sco chau da la tabella

trans-unit.source: Make the last row of the table the table footer.
trans-unit.target: Utilisar l'ultima lingia da la tabella sco pe da la tabella.

trans-unit.source: Define the left column as row header.
trans-unit.target: Utilisar la colonna sanester sco titels da las lingias.

trans-unit.source: Make the table sortable (requires JavaScript and a table header).
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar la pussaivladad da zavrar la tabella tenor las colonnas (basegna JavaScript ed in chau da tabella).

trans-unit.source: The number of the default sort column.
trans-unit.target: Il numer da la colonna, tenor quella che duai vegnir zavrà sco standard.

trans-unit.source: Please select the operation mode of the accordion element.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna il modus operativ da l'element accordeon

trans-unit.source: Marks the beginning of an accordion pane that spans several content elements.
trans-unit.target: Marchescha l'entschatta d'ina fanestra d'accordeon che cumpiglia plirs elements da cuntegn

trans-unit.source: Marks the end of an accordion pane that spans several content elements.
trans-unit.target: Marchescha la fin d'ina fanestra d'accordeon che cumpiglia plirs elements da cuntegn

trans-unit.source: Behaves like a single text element that is inside an accordion pane.
trans-unit.target: Correspunda in element da text en ina fanestra d'accordeon.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the headline of the content pane. HTML tags are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha il titel dal spazi da cuntegn. Tags HTML èn lubids.

trans-unit.source: Here you can format the section headline using CSS code.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti formatar il titel da la secziun cun utilisar code CSS.

trans-unit.source: Leave blank to use the default classes or enter a custom toggler and accordion class.
trans-unit.target: Laschar vid per utilisar las classas da standard ni endatar ina classa persunalisada da toggler ni accordeon.

trans-unit.source: Here you can configure the syntax highlighter (e.g. gutter: false;).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti configurar la coluraziun da la sintaxa (p. ex. gutter: false;).

trans-unit.source: Note that the code will not be executed. Use F11 to toggle the fullscreen mode if you are using the code editor.
trans-unit.target: Fai stim che il code na vegn betg exequì. Cun F11 pos ti midar en il modus da maletg entir, sche ti utiliseschas l'editur da code.

trans-unit.source: The link text will be displayed instead of the target URL.
trans-unit.target: Il text da la colliaziun vegn mussà empè da l'adressa da la colliaziun.

trans-unit.source: The link title is added as title attribute in the HTML markup.
Use the wildcard "%s" to embed the link in a phrase (e.g. For more information please visit %s).
trans-unit.target: Utilisescha il tegnaplazza "%s" per incorporar la colliaziun en in text (p. ex. Per ulteriuras infurmaziuns pudais vus visitar %s).

trans-unit.source: To trigger the lightbox, enter a rel attribute here.
Use an image instead of the link title.
trans-unit.target: Utilisar in maletg empè dal text da la colliaziun.

trans-unit.source: Please select one or more files or folders from the files directory. If you select a folder, its files will be included automatically.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna ina u pliras datotecas u ordinaturs da la survista da datotecas. Sche ti tschernas in ordinatur vegnan las datotecas lien encolladas automaticamain.

trans-unit.source: The sort order of the items.
trans-unit.target: La successiun da zavrar dals elements.

trans-unit.source: Use the home directory as file source if there is an authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: Utilisar l'ordinatur persunal sco funtauna da datotecas sche l'utilisader è s'annunzià.

trans-unit.source: The number of image thumbnails per row.
trans-unit.target: Il dumber da maletgs da prevista per ritscha.

trans-unit.source: The number of items per page. Set to 0 to disable pagination.
trans-unit.target: Il dumber d'elements per pagina. Inditgescha 0 per betg far paginas.

trans-unit.source: Here you can limit the total number of images. Set to 0 to show all.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti limitar il dumber total da maletgs. Scriva 0 per mussar tuts.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the gallery template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il template per la galaria.

trans-unit.source: Here you can add the video/audio file or multiple files if you are using different codecs.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti agiuntar la datoteca dad video/audio (u las datotecas sche ti utiliseschas differents codecs).

trans-unit.source: Please enter the YouTube video ID (e.g. nsqh9jHkHlM).
trans-unit.target: Endatescha p. pl. l'ID da YouTube (p. ex. nsqh9jHkHlM).

trans-unit.source: Show this image instead of the first frame of the video before playback.
trans-unit.target: Mussar quest maletg empè da l'emprim frame avant ch'il video vegn fatg ir.

trans-unit.source: Width and height of the media player in pixels (e.g. 640x480). Applies to videos only.
trans-unit.target: Ladezza ed autezza dal player en pixels (p.ex. 640x480). Pertutga be videos.

trans-unit.source: Automatically play the video when the page loads.
trans-unit.target: Far ir automaticamain il video sche la pagina chargia.

trans-unit.source: The time in milliseconds between slides (1000 = 1s). Set to 0 to disable auto sliding.
trans-unit.target: Il temp en millisecundas tranter ils maletgs (1000 = 1s). Scriva 0 per deactivar la midada automatica.

trans-unit.source: The transition speed in milliseconds (1000 = 1s). Defaults to 300.
trans-unit.target: La durada da la midada en millisecundas (1000 = 1s). Standard è 300.

trans-unit.source: Here you can make the slider start with a particular slide (counting starts at 0).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir ch'il slider cumenza cun in maletg particular (l'emprim maletg è il numer 0).

trans-unit.source: Make the slider continuous (start all over when reaching the end).
trans-unit.target: Far ch'il slider mida cuntinuadamain (cumenzar da l'entschatta sche la fin è cuntanschida).

trans-unit.source: Please choose the content element you want to insert.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna l'element da cuntegn che ti vuls inserir

trans-unit.source: Please choose the article you want to insert.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna l'artitgel che ti vuls inserir

trans-unit.source: Show the content element to certain member groups only.
trans-unit.target: Be mussar quest element da cuntegn a tschertas gruppas da commembers.

trans-unit.source: These groups will be able to see the content element.
trans-unit.target: Questas gruppas da commembers vegnan ad esser ablas da vesair l'element da cuntegn.

trans-unit.source: Hide the content element if a member is logged in.
Here you can set an ID and one or more classes.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir ina ID ed ina u pliras classas da CSS.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the spacing in front of and after the content element in pixel. You should try to avoid inline styles and define the spacing in a style sheet, though.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar spazi en pixels avant e suenter l'element da cuntegn. Ti duessas empruvar dad evitar tenor pussaivladad styles integrads e definir la distanza en in stylesheet.

trans-unit.source: Hide the element on the website.
trans-unit.target: Zuppentar l'element sin la pagina web.

trans-unit.source: Do not show the element on the website before this day.
trans-unit.target: Betg mussar quest element sin la pagina d'internet avant quest di.

trans-unit.source: Do not show the element on the website on and after this day.
trans-unit.target: Betg mussar quest element sin la pagina d'internet suenter quest di.
Opziuns da la colliaziun da maletg

trans-unit.source: The %s template needs to be included in the page layout.
trans-unit.target: Il template %s sto vegnir inclus en il layout da pagina.

trans-unit.source: The %s or %s template needs to be included in the page layout.
trans-unit.target: Il template %s u %s sto vegnir inclus en il layout da pagina.
Agiuntar in nov element da cuntegn

trans-unit.source: Show the details of content element ID %s
trans-unit.target: Mussar ils detagls da l'element da cuntegn cun l'ID %s

trans-unit.source: Edit the settings of the article

trans-unit.target: Encollar suenter l'element da cuntegn cun l'ID %s

trans-unit.source: Add new after content element ID %s
trans-unit.target: Crear in nov element suenter l'element da cuntegn cun l'ID %s

trans-unit.source: Toggle the visibility of element ID %s
trans-unit.target: Midar la visibilitad da l'element cun l'ID %s
Modifitgar l'element da funtauna cun l'ID %s
